Tired of channel surfing, looking for your favorite FOX Sports shows? FOXSports.com on Lycos has created the ultimate guide for FOX Sports and Fox Sports Net television and radio programming. Check out our new Show Pages <http://foxsports.lycos.com/shows/index.adp?mailInfo=020116_h>.

You can find out what's new with your favorite shows like Best Damn Sports Show Period and National Sports Report, watch the latest video clips, get the inside scoop on your favorite talent, participate in show polls, and chat back in the Fan Forums. Plus, you can find out who will be on upcoming shows and a daily schedule of when to watch.

Check out the show pages now! <http://foxsports.lycos.com/shows/index.adp?mailInfo=020116_h>
